title: infiniflow/ragflow
summary: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: 1Panel-dev/1Panel
summary: 🔥 1Panel provides an intuitive web interface and MCP Server to manage websites, files, containers, databases, and LLMs on a Linux server.

title: JetBrains/koog
summary: Koog is the official Kotlin framework for building predictable, fault-tolerant and enterprise-ready AI agents across all platforms – from backend services to Android and iOS, JVM, and even in-browser environments. Koog is based on our AI products expertise and provides proven solutions for complex LLM and AI problems

title: 1Panel-dev/MaxKB
summary: 🔥 MaxKB is an open-source platform for building enterprise-grade agents.  强大易用的开源企业级智能体平台。

title: pipeshub-ai/pipeshub-ai
summary: PipesHub is a fully extensible and explainable workplace AI platform for enterprise search and workflow automation

title: milothoelen/AI-ChatBot
summary: 🤖 Build personalized chatbots in just 5 cells using Colab and Groq, making AI visually appealing and user-friendly.

title: JLABUAN/open-agent-sdk-rust
summary: 🤖 Build AI agents in Rust on your hardware for fast, private, and controlled solutions like copy editing, code reviewing, and market analysis.

title: mahdidjemaci/production-rag
summary: 🔍 Enhance retrieval accuracy with a production-ready RAG system that integrates semantic and lexical search for optimal results.

title: Arezkiiiii/mini_llm
summary: 🚀 Build and understand a Large Language Model from scratch using PyTorch through hands-on notebooks focused on core Transformer concepts.

summary: 🧠 Build intelligent agents with Mini Agent, a streamlined demo project leveraging MiniMax M2 for advanced reasoning and robust contextual management.

title: simonesiega/AIcompanion
summary: AIcompanion è un assistente AI modulare sviluppato in Python, progettato per elaborazione conversazionale, analisi documentale e modalità di interrogazione. Integra Flask per l’interfaccia web, LangChain per la gestione del contesto e modelli Ollama eseguiti in locale fornendo un ambiente completo e ottimizzato per workflow AI on-premise.

title: arpan10000/simple-rag-pipeline-demo
summary: 🌌 Build a simple RAG pipeline to generate AI-driven answers using Chroma DB for storage and Grok LLM for context-aware response generation.

title: Almaskhan123/WeKnora
summary: 🔗 Connect and enhance your communication with WeKnora, a powerful platform for seamless integration and interaction in WeChat services.

title: langbot-app/LangBot
summary: Production-grade platform for building IM bots / 生产级即时通信机器人开发平台. Bots for QQ / QQ频道 / Discord / LINE / WeChat(微信, 企业微信)/ Telegram / 飞书 / 钉钉 / Slack e.g. Integrated with ChatGPT(GPT), DeepSeek, Dify, n8n, Langflow, Coze, Claude, Google Gemini, Nano Banana, Kimi, PPIO, Ollama, MiniMax, SiliconFlow, Qwen, Moonshot, MCP etc. LLM & Agent & RAG

title: Ripperrepublicofcolombia803/AI_Trading_Bot
summary: 🤖 Build an AI-driven trading bot for Binance futures with advanced risk management and multi-dimensional analysis for informed trading decisions.

title: langchain4j/langchain4j
summary: LangChain4j is an open-source Java library that simplifies the integration of LLMs into Java applications through a unified API, providing access to popular LLMs and vector databases. It makes implementing RAG, tool calling (including support for MCP), and agents easy. LangChain4j integrates seamlessly with various enterprise Java frameworks.

title: fampi9278/comfy-prompt-studio
summary: 🖼️ Enhance your image creation with ComfyUI Prompt Studio, an AI web app that simplifies prompts for powerful results using advanced technology.
